summary: How to change the skin on objects.
descriptionHtml:
Recommended Programs:
Creation Kit: 
http://www.creationkit.com/

Fallout Mod Manager: 
http://fallout3.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=640

NifSkope:
http://sourceforge.net/projects/niftools/files/nifskope/1.0.22/

Gimp + .dds plugin (or whatever image editing program you prefer, like Photoshop):
http://www.gimp.org/downloads/
http://code.google.com/p/gimp-dds/

Crazybump:
http://www.crazybump.com/ 

CrazyBump Tutorial: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nCncIMY4mhA&feature=youtu.be

So you got this brilliant idea that you need an object for, but Skyrimâ€™s existing objects are just not quite cutting it. You decide you must have the plant Marshmerrow from Morrowind in your mod, but have no idea how to actually make that happen. 

Never fear, the chicken is here.
author: ChickenDownUnder
